entry.title: WIND WARNING , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers.
